mapper.select: SELECT A.ANO AS ANO, A.ANAME AS ANAME, A.ATEL AS ATEL, A.AXPOINT AS AXPOINT, A.AYPOINT AS AYPOINT, A.AADDRNO AS AADDRNO, A.AADDR1 AS AADDR1, A.AADDR2 AS ADDR2, A.ALOGO AS ALOGO, TO_CHAR(AINSERTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INSERTDATE, TO_CHAR(AUPDATEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPDATEDATE FROM ACADEMY A
